mapper.select: select pref_id as prefIf, pref_name as prefName, pref_capital as prefCapital from mst_prefecture where pref_id = #{prefId}
mapper.insert: insert into mst_prefecture ( pref_id, pref_name, pref_capital) values ( #{prefId}, #{prefName}, #{prefCapital}) on duplicate key update pref_id = #{prefId}, pref_name = #{prefName}, pref_capital = #{prefCapital}
